thread.title: Why Did Tom Cruise Skip His Own Daughter's Wedding?
thread.title_full: Why Did Tom Cruise Skip His Own Daughter's Wedding? | The Daily Caller

author: dailycaller
title: Why Did Tom Cruise Skip His Own Daughter's Wedding?
text:
4738429 Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman’s adopted daughter got married a month ago, but a new report claims he was nowhere to be found at the nuptials.
Isabella Cruise, who Tom and Nicole adopted in 1993, wed Max Parker at a small ceremony in London in September, and the 22-year-old’s ceremony was so small that her own father didn’t attend. (RELATED: Nicole Kidman And Naomi Watts Made Out On Stage While Wearing Shower Caps)
Tom Cruise departs for Japan from Gimpo Airport in Seoul, South Korea. (Photo: Splash News)
It’s unclear whether Tom skipped the wedding or wasn’t invited, but a source who was at the wedding reports that Kidman was there.
When Cruise and Kidman got divorced in 2001, both Isabella and her adopted brother Connor chose to live with Tom. (RELATED: Nicole Kidman’s Shocking Comments About Filming Sex Scenes)
